__e: If Matthew committed this crime, he will pay for it, but if he didn't what would your daughter want you to do here?

Well, take too much time and the city will pay for it.

I'm going to get to the bottom of this, and someone's going to pay.
Hopefully, i'll have a trick Who's paying me to sleep there.
